metadata.name: The Cross We Embrace
metadata.description:
‘The Cross We Embrace‘

We all carry weight 
for those we love and for the world.     

My thoughts often return to the cross as a symbol, a form  
as a symbol, a form of hardships and sufferings 
as a guide for humility, kindness and ways to love 
and to lift us above fears to use our given talents as a gift to the world.

‘The Cross We Embrace’ was created for the second Flannel Collective exhibition “From Thought to Form” a FND curated World. This group exhibition was instrumental in providing me with the strength to re-approach this sacred form.  

4000px x 3916px  
40.5 MB  
Original painting Oil on Canvas (2023) 
EAK
